animationsMesh.name: animationsMesh
animationsMesh.description: Defines an animated mesh, usually for characters or animals.

scale.name: scale
scale.description: Used to scale the model up or down.

timedAction.name: timedAction
timedAction.description: Defines a callable action sound and/or animation.

module.name: module
module.description: A module holds different types of script definitions.

CopyFrames.name: CopyFrames
CopyFrames.description: It is unknown what this block does.

wheel.name: wheel
wheel.description: Defines the wheels of a vehicle. While the ID can technically be anything, only the IDs 'FrontLeft', 'FrontRight', 'RearLeft', and 'RearRight' are recognized by the game and will function properly.

passenger.name: passenger
passenger.description: Defines a passenger position in a vehicle script.

category.name: category
category.description: The category under which the recipe will be listed in the crafting menu.

needtobelearn.name: NeedToBeLearn
needtobelearn.description: Whether the recipe needs to be learned before it can be crafted.

skillrequired.name: SkillRequired
skillrequired.description: The skill required to craft the item.

tags.name: tags
tags.description: Tags to define the special behavior of the recipe.

time.name: time
time.description: The time it takes to craft the item, not using a specific unit of time.

timedaction.name: timedAction
timedaction.description: The timed action script to trigger during crafting. Used to trigger animations and/or sounds.

xpaward.name: xpAward
xpaward.description: The amount of experience points awarded upon crafting the item.

CopyFrame.name: CopyFrame
CopyFrame.description: It is unknown what this block does.

entity.name: entity
entity.description: Defines a tile with special properties.

animation.name: animation
animation.description: It is unknown what this block does.

category.name: category
category.description: The category under which the recipe will be listed in the crafting menu.

needtobelearn.name: NeedToBeLearn
needtobelearn.description: Whether the recipe needs to be learned before it can be crafted.

skillrequired.name: SkillRequired
skillrequired.description: The skill required to craft the item.

tags.name: tags
tags.description: Tags to define the special behavior of the recipe.

time.name: time
time.description: The time it takes to craft the item, not using a specific unit of time.

timedaction.name: timedAction
timedaction.description: The timed action script to trigger during crafting. Used to trigger animations and/or sounds.

xpaward.name: xpAward
xpaward.description: The amount of experience points awarded upon crafting the item.

ragdoll.name: ragdoll
ragdoll.description: Defines the ragdoll properties of a bone.

template.name: template
template.description: Uses a template script data for this vehicle.

itemList.name: itemList
itemList.description: A list of items that can be used as input.

mode.name: mode
mode.description: Whenever the item gets consumed or not. Default is `destroy`.

flags.name: flags
flags.description: Provides information about how the recipe impacts the items used in the crafting recipe or identified as valid items.

mappers.name: mappers
mappers.description: Used to associated a specific input item to another specific output item.

overlayMapper.name: overlayMapper
overlayMapper.description: If provided, this input entry is used to determine the overlayMapper of the `craftRecipe`.

tags.name: tags
tags.description: Tags are used to determine which items can be used as input.

fluidList.name: fluidList
fluidList.description: A list of fluids that can be used as input.

categories.name: categories
categories.description: A category of fluid used to determine which fluids can be used as input.

flags.name: flags
flags.description: Flags determine how the fluid is impacted during the recipe or identified.

singleValue.name: singleValue
singleValue.description: A single fluid value defining the output fluid.

customeatsound.name: CustomEatSound
customeatsound.description: Custom sound to play when eating or drinking this item, refers to the ID of a sound script. Set to an empty string to disable any sound from playing.

evolvedrecipe.name: EvolvedRecipe
evolvedrecipe.description: List of evolved recipes this item can be used in.

type.name: Type
type.description: This parameter was replaced by `ItemType` in Build 42.13.

displayname.name: DisplayName
displayname.description: This parameter was removed in Build 42.13, naming an item should be done with a translation entry. See the [wiki](https://pzwiki.net/wiki/DisplayName) page for more information.

minutestoburn.name: MinutesToBurn
minutestoburn.description: How many in-game minutes it takes to burn the food. This value must be higher than `MinutesToCook`.

minutestocook.name: MinutesToCook
minutestocook.description: How many in-game minutes it takes to cook the food. This value must be smaller than `MinutesToBurn`.

fixing.name: fixing
fixing.description: Defines how an item can be repaired or fixed.

physicsHitReaction.name: physicsHitReaction
physicsHitReaction.description: Defines the physics reaction a bullet or bomb imposes to objects.
